short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copies HTML tables to the clipboard or exports them to Microsoft Excel, CSV, Google Sheets, Office 365, etc.
short.es: Copia tablas HTML al portapapeles o las exporta a Microsoft Excel, CSV, Google Sheets, Office 365, etc.
short.zh_CN: 将 HTML 表格复制到剪贴板或导出到 Microsoft Excel、CSV、Google Sheets、Office 365 等。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Table Capture gives you the ability to easily capture HTML tables for use in a spreadsheet, whether using Microsoft Excel, Office 365, Open Office, Google Sheets, etc.

Last updated: January 2025

Features:
• Copy tables to the clipboard with the proper row & column separators
• Export to Google Sheets
• Batch export tables to the clipboard, Excel & Google Sheets 
• Capture <div> tables (or any repeating items on a website)

Table Capture Pro features ($12/year):
• Download tables directly as an Excel spreadsheet or as a CSV file
• Capture multi-page tables and tables that load as you scroll
• Copy tables to the clipboard as Markdown
• Screenshot tables (save as PNG images)
• Export tables to Office 365
• Create "Recipes" for handling tables on specific websites
• Export tables from PDF files (locally and from the web)

Table Capture Cloud features ($25/month):
- Real-time sync to Google Sheets
- Magic Columns: AI-based column parsing
- Table Talk: Ask ChatGPT free-form questions about your data!
- Ollama Integration: Use a local LLM for your advanced data processing needs

Support & Testing: support@georgemike.com
• Please test the extension on the tables provided here: https://www.georgemike.com/tables/test/
long.es:
Table Capture gives you the ability to easily capture HTML tables for use in a spreadsheet, whether using Microsoft Excel, Office 365, Open Office, Google Sheets, etc.

Last updated: Enero de 2025

Features:
+ Copy tables to the clipboard with the necessary column & row separators (tab and newline respectively)
+ Batch table operations: Copy multiple tables to the clipboard simultaneously.
+ Easily create a Google Doc from an HTML table
+ Capture tables that load as you scroll and multi-page tables with the Workshop
+ Capture div-based tables (or any repeating items in a website) by selecting text and launching the Table Capture Workshop

Site-specific capture:
+ Notion (https://www.notion.so)

Table Capture Pro features ($12/year):
+ Download tables directly as an Excel spreadsheet or as a CSV file
+ Export tables to Office 365
+ Copy tables to the clipboard as Markdown text
+ Screenshot tables; download as PNG images
+ Site extraction "Recipes" for tables that require special handling

Table Capture Cloud features ($25/month):
- Real-time sync to Google Sheets
- Magic Columns: AI-based column parsing

Support & Testing:
+ E-mail me for support: support@georgemike.com
+ Before requesting support for issues you're having, please test the extension on the tables provided here: https://www.georgemike.com/tables/test/
+ Please keep in mind: All spreadheet apps are different and it's difficult to ensure correct behavior among them.

One last note: Reviews are great and much appreciated, but emailing me is so much more helpful when it comes to improving the extension.
long.zh_CN:
Table Capture 让您能够轻松捕获 HTML 表格，以便在电子表格中使用，无论是使用 Microsoft Excel、Office 365、Open Office、Google Sheets 等。

最后更新：2025 年 1 月

功能：
• 将表格复制到剪贴板，并保持正确的行列分隔符
• 导出到 Google Sheets
• 批量导出表格到剪贴板、Excel 和 Google Sheets
• 捕获 <div> 表格（或网站上的任何重复项目）

Table Capture Pro 功能（88.88 元人民币）：
• 直接将表格下载为 Excel 电子表格或 CSV 文件
• 捕获多页表格和滚动加载的表格
• 将表格以 Markdown 格式复制到剪贴板
• 表格截图（保存为 PNG 图像）
• 将表格导出到 Office 365
• 为特定网站的表格处理创建"配方"
• 从 PDF 文件导出表格（本地和网络）

Table Capture Cloud 功能（每月25美元）：
• 实时同步到 Google Sheets
• 魔法列：基于 AI 的列解析

支持和测试：support@georgemike.com
• 请在此处提供的表格上测试扩展：https://www.georgemike.com/tables/test/
